languages.text: "Весьма благоразумно, Ваше Сиятельство. Что касается клеветников... полагаю, вы не откажетесь предоставить моим людям координаты той норы, в которой прячутся эти отвратительные крысы".

traits.locale_text: "Весьма благоразумно, Ваше Сиятельство. Что касается клеветников... полагаю, вы не откажетесь предоставить моим людям координаты той норы, в которой прячутся эти отвратительные крысы".

languages.text: "Very prudent, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And as for the slanderers... I presume you will be willing to provide my people with the coordinates of the hole where those repulsive rats are hiding?"
languages.original_text: "Весьма благоразумно, Ваше Сиятельство. Что касается клеветников... полагаю, вы не откажетесь предоставить моим людям координаты той норы, в которой прячутся эти отвратительные крысы".

traits.locale_text: "Very prudent, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And as for the slanderers... I presume you will be willing to provide my people with the coordinates of the hole where those repulsive rats are hiding?"
"Very prudent, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And as for the slanderers... I presume you will be willing to provide my people with the coordinates of the hole where those repulsive rats are hiding?"
"Very prudent, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And as for the slanderers... I presume you will be willing to provide my people with the coordinates of the hole where those repulsive rats are hiding?"
"Very prudent, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And as for the slanderers... I presume you will be willing to provide my people with the coordinates of the hole where those repulsive rats are hiding?"

languages.text: “非常审慎，大人。至于那些诽谤者……我相信，您应该愿意提供坐标，让我的人找到那群臭老鼠的藏身之处吧？”
languages.original_text: "Very prudent, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And as for the slanderers... I presume you will be willing to provide my people with the coordinates of the hole where those repulsive rats are hiding?"

traits.locale_text: “非常审慎，大人。至于那些诽谤者……我相信，您应该愿意提供坐标，让我的人找到那群臭老鼠的藏身之处吧？”

languages.text: «Muy prudente por su parte, mi{mf|lord|lady}. En cuanto a esos calumniadores... ¿Puedo suponer que proporcionará a mi gente las coordenadas del agujero donde esas ratas inmundas se esconden?».
languages.original_text: "Very prudent, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And as for the slanderers... I presume you will be willing to provide my people with the coordinates of the hole where those repulsive rats are hiding?"

traits.locale_text: «Muy prudente por su parte, mi{mf|lord|lady}. En cuanto a esos calumniadores... ¿Puedo suponer que proporcionará a mi gente las coordenadas del agujero donde esas ratas inmundas se esconden?».

languages.text: 「実に賢明なご判断です、陛下。その不届き者に関しまして…陛下は、こうした不快なネズミの穴蔵の場所を住民に教えるつもりかと存じますが、いかがでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Very prudent, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And as for the slanderers... I presume you will be willing to provide my people with the coordinates of the hole where those repulsive rats are hiding?"

traits.locale_text: 「実に賢明なご判断です、陛下。その不届き者に関しまして…陛下は、こうした不快なネズミの穴蔵の場所を住民に教えるつもりかと存じますが、いかがでしょう？」

languages.text: "Sehr klug, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Und was die Verleumder angeht ... Ich nehme an, Ihr werdet meinen Leuten bereitwillig die Koordinaten des Lochs nennen, in dem sich diese widerlichen Ratten verstecken?"
languages.original_text: "Very prudent, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And as for the slanderers... I presume you will be willing to provide my people with the coordinates of the hole where those repulsive rats are hiding?"

traits.locale_text: "Sehr klug, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Und was die Verleumder angeht ... Ich nehme an, Ihr werdet meinen Leuten bereitwillig die Koordinaten des Lochs nennen, in dem sich diese widerlichen Ratten verstecken?"

languages.text: « Vous faites preuve d'une grande prudence, Votre Seigneurie. Quant aux diffamateurs... Je présume que vous voudrez bien fournir à mes subalternes les coordonnées du trou où se cachent ces rats répugnants ? »
languages.original_text: "Very prudent, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And as for the slanderers... I presume you will be willing to provide my people with the coordinates of the hole where those repulsive rats are hiding?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous faites preuve d'une grande prudence, Votre Seigneurie. Quant aux diffamateurs... Je présume que vous voudrez bien fournir à mes subalternes les coordonnées du trou où se cachent ces rats répugnants ? »

languages.text: "Yerinde bir tutum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Müfterilere gelince... O pis farelerin saklandığı deliğin koordinatlarını bizimle de paylaşırsınız umarım."
languages.original_text: "Very prudent, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And as for the slanderers... I presume you will be willing to provide my people with the coordinates of the hole where those repulsive rats are hiding?"

traits.locale_text: "Yerinde bir tutum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Müfterilere gelince... O pis farelerin saklandığı deliğin koordinatlarını bizimle de paylaşırsınız umarım."
